column2: 1.  A sentence of 10 years of rigorous imprisonment is imposed.
2.  A fine of Rs. 10,000/= is imposed.
In default of payment of fine 06 months of simple imprisonment is imposed.
4.  A sum of Rs. 200,000/= must be paid to the victim girl Arulanantham Piritha.
